review: I donâ€™t know how anyone could not give this 5 stars. Escape from Mars was great. Good clues that made you think. The staff was great and gave us good hints when needed.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Mars" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Did the Mars room with a couple of friends. It was well put together and challenging. Tons of fun and friendly staff. I'm looking forward to do the Casino room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Mars" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: We did the Mars room. I've done multiple escape rooms from different places and have to say that this one was by far the worst. The price was cheap that's why they are getting 2 stars. It felt like they didn't put a lot of time into it. Having multiple people was a disadvantage due to only being able to solve one thing at a time to move on. The rooms looked pretty basic and didn't follow the storyline.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Mars" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Escape from Mars was great!!! The puzzles are well thought out and challenging. LOVED IT!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Mars" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: A great time had with ESCAPEability! The Mars room was great, we pictured ourselves being Mark Watney, but we are sure he wouldn't be able to escape this room! Challenging yet not impossible, all in all great fun. Will be back!
